question.body: The overactivity of which bone cells would cause Anne's bones to become more porous and weaker?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Osteoblasts put calcium into bone, this is known as bone deposition.
Correct. Osteoclasts break down bone and take calcium out of bones, this is known as bone resorption.
Incorrect. Osteocytes are mature bone cells that maintain the structure of bone.

part.hint: which cells remove calcium from the bone?
